entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0204.10704] The concept us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAmortization with a value of 2,560,000 has been used with the axis PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis and the member acrs:OperatingLeasesMember. The concept us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAmortization should be used with the FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis or the IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis. Alternatively a different concept should be used to represent a line item associated with PPE.
Concept : us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAmortization Value : 2,560,000 Period : 2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis=acrs:OperatingLeasesMember
